query.statement: SELECT CONVERT(BIGINT, (CEILING(COUNT(1) OVER()/3))) AS TOTCNT , A.RM , A.TYPE_CD , A.CD_NM , A.UP_TYPE_CD , A.E_CD_NM FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TYPE_CD) AS RM , TYPE_CD , CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale= 'en' THEN CD_NM_ENG WHEN :vo.session_user_locale= 'fr' THEN CD_NM_FRA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale= 'de' THEN CD_NM_DEU ELSE CD_NM_ENG END AS CD_NM , UP_TYPE_CD , CD_NM_ENG AS E_CD_NM FROM TN_COM_CONTRACTTYPE_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND UP_TYPE_CD = 'T03' AND TYPE_CD <> 'T0399' ) A

SELECT TYPE_CD , CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale= 'en' THEN CD_NM_ENG WHEN :vo.session_user_locale= 'fr' THEN CD_NM_FRA WHEN :vo.session_user_locale= 'de' THEN CD_NM_DEU ELSE CD_NM_ENG END CD_NM , UP_TYPE_CD , 'type3' OPT_NM , CD_NM_ENG AS E_CD_NM FROM TN_COM_CONTRACTTYPE_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND LEN(TYPE_CD) = 7 AND TYPE_CD <> 'T039999' ORDER BY PRNT_SRT
